error.title: Scene setting
error.description:
## Invalid scene setting found
At least one of the settings in a scene doesn't match task settings in database.
{invalid_setting_str}
### How to repair?
Change values for '{invalid_keys_str}' in the scene OR change them on a task on AYON server if they are wrong there OR use `Repair` button to reset all settings (duration, resolution) according to values set on the task.
In the scene it is right mouse click on failed published composition > `Composition Settings`.
error.detail:
### __Detailed Info__ (optional)
This error is shown when for example resolution in the scene doesn't match to resolution set on the task on AYON server. Either value in the AYON or in the scene is wrong.

error.title: Scene file doesn't exist
error.description:
## Scene file doesn't exist
Collected scene {scene_url} doesn't exist.
### How to repair?
Re-save file, start publish from the beginning again.
